translations: adj.财力不足的；资金短缺的
v.资金不足（underfinance 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: From the beginning, the project was underfinanced.
sentences.translation: 从一开始，这个项目就资金短缺。

sentences.sentence: Others point to an underfinanced pension system so skewed in favor of older Japanese that many younger workers simply refuse to pay;
sentences.translation: 其他人指出资金不足的退休金系统过于照顾日本年纪较大的人群，导致许多年轻员工不愿意缴纳养老金；
